paper.title: The impact of product innovation announcements on firm value: evidence from the bio-pharmaceutical industry
paper.abstract: We investigate the impact of product innovation announcements on firm value using an extensive data set of bio-pharmaceutical products. We find that two main effects shape observed firm value changes: a 'probability effect', which depends on how investors perceive the product's likelihood of success, and a 'portfolio effect' that depends on the relative importance of a product within a company's portfolio. We estimate product-specific success probabilities using various machine learning methods. The portfolio importance is measured by product and date-specific net present values. We find that market reactions increase in the portfolio importance of the product under development and diminish in its success probability. Our results aid corporations and investors in evaluating the financial consequences of innovation-related news.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究产品创新公告对公司价值的影响，虽然使用了机器学习方法估计产品成功概率，但其核心研究并不直接涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
